notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Some text appears to be missing: B₄r catchword "time" does not carry to next page.
"This Book of Articles, being extremely negligently printed at London, (which impression I disavow) I was forced to review, and have it printed again at Cambridge. R.Norv." -- foot of t.p.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
